headline: Capri CEO John Idol’s Pay Slips to $9.1 Million
summary: The company paid a retention bonus to former CFO and operating chief Thomas Edwards, but was unable to keep him from jumping to Macy’s.

raw.headline: Capri CEO John Idol’s Pay Slips to $9.1 Million
raw.summary: The company paid a retention bonus to former CFO and operating chief Thomas Edwards, but was unable to keep him from jumping to Macy’s.

headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks with Mounting Challenges
summary: Mid-cap stocks have the best odds of scaling into $100 billion corporations thanks to their tested business models and large addressable markets. But the many opportunities in front of them attract significant competition, spanning from industry behemoths with seemingly infinite resources to small, nimble players with chips on their shoulders.

raw.headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks with Mounting Challenges
